ygData.subject: Re: My overcrowding solutuion (OT)
ygData.msgSnippet: ... True, but the root problem we were trying to solve was the attractiveness of camping compared to crawling.  Nobody was trying to address high levels
ygData.messageBody:
On Fri, 28 Jan 2000, Jeff Illian wrote:
>
> Crawling or camping, either way the key is that you have to get them out of
> the level 30 dungeons some how. Hell, for that matter, you got to get them
> out of some of the level 40+ dungeons! Nothing is more annoying then to
>
> I've always been taught to solve the root problem and not the symptoms.
> It's the only real solution.

True, but the root problem we were trying to solve was the
attractiveness of camping compared to crawling. Nobody was
trying to address high levels killing low level stuff until
you brought it up. Like I said, the pro-crawling solutions we
came up with work - even your L50s in a L20 dungeon are
crawling instead of camping.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
